question:
[Anthony] asked his aunt, [Faye], to read him a story. [Faye] unfortunately was n't able to, since she did n't have her glasses, and she was almost blind without them. [Jamie] went to the store with her sister [Julie] [Jamie] went to her son [Joel]'s House [Sarah] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Mary]. [Julie], who is the sister of [Faye], is a lovely girl. [Sarah]'s son [Charles] is turning nine today, so she is throwing him a party. [Nola] and [Joel] left that evening to go bowling. [Mary] enjoyed a homemade dinner with her son [Anthony]
Question: How is [Nola] related to [Charles]?
